newsitem.title: UK: European Diary for Advertising & Media - to Apr 27.
newsitem.headline: European Diary for Advertising & Media - to Apr 27.

text.p: REUTERS EUROPEAN DIARY OF EVENTS FOR ADVERTISING & MEDIA - to April 27
The following is a four-week diary of events covering advertising, marketing, media and the Internet in Europe.
THURSDAY, APRIL 3
HELSINKI - MEDIA '97 publishing, advertising, marketing fair.
NEUCHATEL, Switzerland - Meeting on information superhighway organised by the Council of Europe parliamentary committee on science and technology (To April 4).
FRIDAY, APRIL 4
NEUCHATEL, Switzerland - Meeting on information superhighway organised by the Council of Europe parliamentary committee on science and technology (Final day).
TUESDAY, APRIL 8

LONDON - "Creative Radio Workshop for Advertisers," presented by Radio Advertising Bureau for the Incorporated Society of British Advertisers. 0930-1630 GMT. The London Business School, Regent's Park. Contact: (44) 171 306 2573.
LONDON - Deadline for entries for NewMediaAge Effectiveness Awards 1997. Contact: (44) 171 734 0770.
THURSDAY, APRIL 10
PARIS - Television Francaise 1 1996 results.
WEDNESDAY, APRIL 16
LONDON - The Marketer's Guide to Innovation and the Bottom Line, Royal Aeronautical Society, 4 Hamilton Place, Hyde Park Corner.
MONDAY, APRIL 21
LONDON - Electronic Programme Guides: The Gateway to Next Generation Television, Le Meridien Hotel. Contact: (44) 171-453-2700 or (44) 171-637-4383. (first day of three-day conference)
LONDON - Cable & Satellite 97, Earls Court 2. Contact: (44) 01203 426484. Web site: http://www.cabsat.co.uk (first day of three-day conference).

LONDON - Television Distribution Technology 97, in conjunction with Cable & Satellite 97 exhibition, Earls Court International Hotel. Contact: (44) 171 637 4383 or (44) 171 453 2700. (first day of three-day exhibition).
TUESDAY, APRIL 22
LONDON - Electronic Programme Guides: The Gateway to Next Generation Television, Le Meridien Hotel. (second day of three day conference).
LONDON - Cable & Satellite 97, Earls Court 2 (second day of three day conference).
LONDON - Television Distribution Technology 97, Earls Court International Hotel (second day of three-day exhibition).
LONDON - UK Internet Show '97, Earls Court. Contact: (44) 181 390 2027 or http://www.ukinternetshhow.com. (first day of three-day exhibition).
WEDNESDAY, APRIL 23
LONDON - Electronic Programme Guides: The Gateway to Next Generation Television, Marriott Hotel. (final of three-day conference, note different location for last day).
LONDON - Cable & Satellite 97, Earls Court 2 (final day of three-day conference).
LONDON - Television Distribution Technology 97 (final day of three-day exhibition).
LONDON - UK Internet Show '97, Earls Court. (second day of three-day exhibition).
LONDON - The Marketer's Guide to Driving Loyalty. Royal Aeronautical Society, 4 Hamilton Place, Hyde Park Corner.

LONDON - European Internet Service Provision Congress. Pricing, Marketing, Technology and Competitive Issues Congress. Hilton London Olympia Hotel. Contact: (44) 171 421 3500. (first day of two-day conference).

BRUSSELS - DMA/EDMA Success@WWW Seminar, Pre-Forum Internet marketing seminar ahead of two-day forum of European Direct Marketing Association. Management Centre Europe, rue de l'Aqueduc, 118 B-1050 Brussels. Contact: (32) 2 779 42 68.
THURSDAY, APRIL 24
LONDON - UK Internet Show '97, Earls Court. (final day of three-day exhibition).
LONDON - European Internet Service Provision Congress. Pricing, Marketing, Technology and Competitive Issues Congress. Hilton London Olympia Hotel. (second day of two-day conference)
BRUSSELS - EDMA Forum 1997: The European Relationship Marketing Forum, sponsored by European Direct Marketing Association.
(first day of two-day conference). Management Centre Europe, rue de l'Aqueduc, 118 B-1050 Brussels. Contact: (32) 2 779 42 68 *****************
Friday, April 25
BRUSSELS - EDMA Forum 1997: The European Relationship Marketing Forum. (second day of two-day conference).
